CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Number_of_Parts__c = 0, "No parts available", IF( AND( MSP_Not_Meet__c, Total_Number_of_Parts__c > 0 ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","red", 20, 20) + " One or more parts is below MSP", IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "yellow", 20, 20) + " No parts are below MSP" ) )
CustomField.label: MSP Price Warning
